@graph.name: Customer Portal - Self-Service Delivery Tracking Solution - Route4Me
@graph.description: Reduce customer service workload with our Customer Portal. Let your customers track their deliveries in real-time, view estimated arrival times, and access driver information without calling your staff.
@graph.keywords: customer portal, delivery tracking, self-service tracking, customer service automation, delivery status updates, route visibility, ETA tracking, last mile visibility, customer communication, inbound visit tracking, field service visibility, delivery transparency, logistics customer service, delivery monitoring, customer experience

@graph.name: Customer Portal
@graph.description: Route4Me's Customer Portal allows you to minimize the amount of time your team spends on low-value activities such as customer service, track-and-trace, and keeping customers up-to-date with the status of their inbound visits. As the number of customers you serve daily increases, so does the administrative and customer service burden on your organization. Our customer portal solves this by allowing your customers to sign in using a tracking number or their Account ID to monitor the status of their inbound visit. You control exactly how much information is revealed, including estimated arrival times, driver identity, custom fields, and other delivery details.

@graph.name: Request Customer Portal Information
@graph.description: Contact our team to discuss implementing the Customer Portal for your organization

@graph.name: Customer Access Methods
@graph.value: Account ID login, tracking number lookup

@graph.name: Visibility Options
@graph.value: Estimated arrival times, driver identity, custom fields, visit status

@graph.name: Business Benefits
@graph.value: Reduced customer service calls, minimized administrative tasks
